text: Pa ri Templo xuꞌbꞌuriqa ri winaq ri tajin kakikꞌayij e wakax, e chij, rachiꞌl e palomax, xuqujeꞌ e kꞌo puꞌwiꞌ taq ri kimexa tajin kakikꞌex pwaq.2:14 Ri aꞌwaj ri kekꞌayix pa ri are waꞌ ri ketzuj cho ri Dios. Ri pwaq ri kakꞌex pa ri templo are waꞌ ri pwaq ri xwi pa ri templo kariqitaj wi. E kꞌi man xtzꞌaqatisax ta ri kirajil rumal man sukꞌ ta kenoꞌjin ri e kꞌexol taq re.
